parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the tag that you want to create. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~131035~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   stack: stack
*   stackgroup: stack group
*   template: template
*   templatescratch: scenario

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the resource. You can specify up to 20 tags.
